body:
## Major changes
* PID tuning tab/toolbox
* Many tabs can now also be used as toolboxes now
* New lighthouse base station geometry wizard

## What's Changed
* Update about.ui by @knmcguire in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/613
* Add tab for tuning PIDs by @krichardsson in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/614
* update install doc and userguide by @knmcguire in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/617
* Unify tabs and toolboxes by @krichardsson in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/622
* Implement multi basestation wizard in cfclient by @knmcguire in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/621
* Check opencv install in LighthouseBsGeoEstimator by @knmcguire in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/625
* hide labels based on basestation availability  by @knmcguire in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/623
* Updated geo estimation by @krichardsson in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/626
* Handle exceptions from CR when scanning on button press by @evoggy in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/629
* Update setup.py by @knmcguire in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/632
* Update docs 2022.9 by @knmcguire in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/631
* Improved documentation by @krichardsson in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/633
* Added LH wizard images assets to build by @evoggy in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/634

## New Contributors
* @evoggy made their first contribution in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/629

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/compare/2022.5...2022.9

## Major changes
* Python 3.10 support
* LED-ring headlights fixed

## What's Changed
* Updates for flashing the AI-deck by @krichardsson in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/589
* Added assert dump button by @krichardsson in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/594
* Use int for QProgressBar.setValue() by @krichardsson in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/598
* Use int for adjust() by @krichardsson in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/599
* Update async Qt implementation by @krichardsson in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/602
* Only enable advanced input fields in advanced mode by @krichardsson in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/603
* Fixing head lights check box by @krichardsson in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/608
* fix unexpected type issue by @knmcguire in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/609
* Fixed type problems by @krichardsson in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/610

For closed issues please see the [2022.5 milestone](https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/milestone/25?closed=1)

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/compare/2022.3...2022.5

## What's Changed
* Set empty param description if no description is found by @krichardsson in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/586
* Dynamically handle nr of base stations by @krichardsson in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/590
* Show cf2 first in release list in bootloader dialog by @krichardsson in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/591


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/compare/2022.1...2022.3

## What's Changed
* Use log_param_doc.json from crazyflie-firmware by @jonasdn in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/521
* setup.py: Widen tolerated numpy version by @jonasdn in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/529
* FlightTab: Remove unused flightmode.ratepid param by @jonasdn in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/531
* main: warn once about USB permissions on scan by @jonasdn in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/532
* docs: Fix a few typos by @timgates42 in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/534
* Update text about usb devices, fixes #539 by @knmcguire in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/540
* updated flightcommand buttons to gray out if controller is attached by @knmcguire in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/542
* Make Client Work With Jonas Fedora 35 by @jonasdn in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/543
* Revamp parameter tab by @jonasdn in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/544
* ParamTab: RO params cannot be set by @jonasdn in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/545
* Bump dependencies to support Py3.10 by @ataffanel in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/550
* FlightTab: Do not update removed label by @jonasdn in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/554
* Fix XB1 gamepad support on M1 Mac by @ataffanel in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/553
* Fix Color picker on LED-tab not working by @ataffanel in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/556
* paramTab: Adjust param treeview to dark mode by @jonasdn in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/562
* paramTab: Adjust sizes by @jonasdn in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/561
* Lighthouse tab: adjust graphics by @krichardsson in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/563
* fix parsing xml qtm by @knmcguire in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/567
* Remove Windows CI by @ataffanel in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/566
* LogTab: Adapt to dark mode by @jonasdn in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/565
* FlightTab: Do not set PID controller by default by @jonasdn in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/570
* ParamTab: UI fixes by @jonasdn in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/568
* ParamTab: Catch error from param.set_value() by @jonasdn in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/573
* Fixes problem when getting Loco data from CF by @krichardsson in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/578
* added upgraded sip qt to setup by @knmcguire in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/579
* Updated to python 3.7 by @krichardsson in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/580
* Updated documentation by @krichardsson in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/581
* Wiki be gone by @knmcguire in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/583
* bootloader dialog Release flashing not picking new release  by @knmcguire in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/576

## New Contributors
* @timgates42 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/pull/534

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/compare/2021.6.1...2022.1

The main feature of this release is support for the lighthouse positioning system. There is now a lighthouse tab where the lighthouse positioning system can be configured and visualized.

To support updates of the firmware in the lighthouse (and other decks) deck, the bootloading process has also been updated. The main bootloading work flow now starts from a connected Crazyflie (warm booting) and if a deck is installed on the Crazyflie, the bootloading process will also update the firmware of the deck (firmware for the lighthouse deck is bundled in the release zip). Cooldboot flashing is still available as a recovery option, but is not considered the main flow.

The release also contains various bug fixes and clean ups.

## Main new features

One of the main new feature of this release is the addition of a 3D visualization in the LPS tab.

Unfortunately the Windows build is broken in this release, installing on Windows using PIP does work though.

- Added support for TDoA
 - Support for switching LPS mode remotely

## Closed issues/pull requests

#315 Add anchor position estimator
#319 Add support for changing and displaying LPS ranging mode
#320 Implement GUI to switch LPS anchor mode

name: Crazyflie client 2017.04
body:
# Important changes

 - Switch to PyQT5
 - Windows build is now an official release build
 - Support for Z-Ranger deck (height-hold mode)
 - Position hold mode
 - Loco positioning tab

# [Full list of change](https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/milestone/9?closed=1)

#257 No Input-device found on Windows 10 x64  with 2016.4
#261 Python interpreter crashes when running cfclient on windows with 64bit Python
#262 Bug with jsonapi(zmq) in Win7 x64 binary release 2016.4.1
#263 Windows build fails in appveyor and Windows instruction needs to be updated
#267 Detect of gamepad buttons does not work
#269 QT5 support to run on macOS 10.12.x (and other OS)
#271 Cfloader not able to flash Crazyflie 1
#272 Fix windows build
#275 Save windows size for next time the client is open
#276 Add a tab for the Loco Positioning system
#277 Remove examples
#278 Improve console tab
#280 Add support for velocity control
#284 Add anchor position settings to the Loco Positioning tab
#286 Use Anchor positions from the memory subsystem 
#292 Indicate the number of the closest anchor in the LPS tab
#294 Adjust address and radio text boxes to fit text
#295 Optimize drawing of tabs
#300 Add support for Z-ranger
#302 Update about box
#303 Replace icon with new Bitcraze logo
#304 Height setpoint not updated when altitude-hold is enabled

name: Crazyflie PC client 2016.4
body:
- Various bug fixes
- Fixed Windows build (the windows installer is still considered experimental)
- Fixed setup.py installation: on Linux and Mac it is now possible to install cfclient using pip.
- Separated the cfclient from cflib: cflib is now in an independent project. This makes development easier

A list of the tickets closed for this release is available in the [milestone](https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/issues?q=milestone%3A2016.4.1).

name: Crazyflie PC client 2016.02
body:
## Outstanding changes
- Fixed Crazyflie 1 configuration
- Fixed Crazyflie 1 update via ZIP file
- Some update and fix for OSX
- Modified GPS tab to use a web-based map.

## Full list of change

For the full list of fixed tickets see the [2016.02 milestone](https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/issues?q=milestone%3A2016.02).

name: Crazyflie PC client 2015.09
body:
No main feature in this new release but the Crazyflie client code has been ported to Python 3.

Main changes:
- Ported Crazyflie client to Python 3.4+
- cflib is compatible with Python 2.7 and 3.4+
- Implemented radio 'safelink', a more reliable radio link. Will work with future Crazyflie firmware.
- Added more example code for cflib.

name: Crazyflie PC client 2015.08
body:
Notable new features:
- New input device modes that allows training mode
- ZMQ interface to control Crazyflie from other programs. It includes interface to log, param and the input subsystem (ie. to send setpoints to Crazyflie)
- USB connection to the Crazyflie 2.0
- New tab for controlling LEDs on the LED-ring individually
- LED-ring effects and headlight control on the Flight Tab
- Increased radio performance giving quicker connection

[Full changelog](https://github.com/bitcraze/crazyflie-clients-python/issues?q=milestone%3A2014.12%2B+is%3Aclosed)

name: Crazyflie PC client 2014.12.3
body:
Bug fixed:
- Crazyflie 2.0 configuration
- Bug that prevented connecting a Crazyflie after opening the about box

Bug-fix release.
- Fixed Crazyflie 1 compatibility
- Removed SDL2 dependency for Linux
- Fixed the debug about box
- Fixed progress bar for Mac-OS X Yosemite
